english.segment1: I'm here waiting for something new to break my heart. So callous laden, I can't feel a thing at all. Will You catch my fall?
english.segment2: From lost and not found, to run and not hide. My hand inside.. (Your hand)
english.segment3: Fear is keeping time with the beating of my heart. Doin' way too much thinkin'. And it's tearing me apart. But I, I feel You reach for me
english.segment4: From lost and not found, to run and not hide. My hand inside.. (Your hand). Losing my grip falling so far. My hand inside Your hand
english.segment5: I hear Your voice and follow. So hard to believe, and still I go
